annotation.spannedText: any attempt of a wild animal to come closer should be avoided

classMention.mentionClass: any attempt of a wild animal to come closer should be avoided

annotation.spannedText: It is by no means meant as an affront to the independent Maine spirit

classMention.mentionClass: It is by no means meant as an affront to the independent Maine spirit

annotation.spannedText: the Department of Agriculture chose this way to help towns fund their animal control departments, as well as send monies to various animal shelters

classMention.mentionClass: the Department of Agriculture chose this way to help towns fund their animal control departments, as well as send monies to various animal shelters

annotation.spannedText: An added benefit is that if your dog gets loose with a rabies tag and registration tag on his collar, animal control can easily find out who the animal is and bring him home rather than take him to the local shelter where you would have to post bail

classMention.mentionClass: An added benefit is that if your dog gets loose with a rabies tag and registration tag on his collar, animal control can easily find out who the animal is and bring him home rather than take him to the local shelter where you would have to post bail

annotation.spannedText: An ounce of prevention truly is worth a pound of cure in the case of rabies as there IS no cure

classMention.mentionClass: An ounce of prevention truly is worth a pound of cure in the case of rabies as there IS no cure
